comments.comment: Ranil mahathmayage maama thamai J.R.Jayawardhana. ohu Nayakathwaya R. Premadasa mahathata baara dheela gaurawayen pitath wela giya. J.R. Jayawardhana maamage jaanaya Ranilta thibuna nam J.R. wage gaurawayen thama Nayakathwayen iwath wela wenath Kenekuta Nayakathwaya baara dhunnanam Ranil banaata ay bari ohutath maamawa aadharshayata aragena theeranayak ganna. Bari mandha? Ekko Sajith mahathmayata wenath wikalpayak ganna sidhdha wenawa. Lalith Athulathmudhali ha Gamini Disanayaka pakshayen iwath wela Raaja aliya salakunen wenath pakshayak nirmaananaya kala wagey Sajith mahathmaya kala yuthui. Cabinet eke wadipura Sajithta sahayogaya dhena aya wadi. Janathaawath illanne Sajithwa. Laksha 55 chandhaya dhun janathaawa wenuwen Sajith mahathmaya  ikman theeranakata elanbiya yuthui. Kal no mara mara. Maha chandhayata wadi kaalayak naha. Dhanma sangvidhaanaya kala yuthui.

comments.comment: I am sure you mean that the transport permit is a deterrent to harmful excavation. You say that changing the horn does not solve a problem in the motor. So restricting transport is a wrong solution to the excavation problem. Sand, etc. does not necessarily the result of excavation. It can be the debris of a demolished building or, more contemporarily, the result of a landslide or a construction company transporting material from one site to another. If there is an environmental problem, legislate excavation instead of finding an easy solution.
comments.author: Siri DE Alwis
